window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});}function handleBlur(){if(containerRef.current){containerRef.current.classList.remove('keyboard-up');}}/********** Логика шагов **********/const[currentStep,setCurrentStep]=useState(1);const[isFinished,setIsFinished]=useState(false);const[isFinishClicked,setIsFinishClicked]=useState(false);const ${speakerQualities[currentSpeakerIndex][idx]==='positive'?'green':''}`,onClick:()=>handleQualitySelectForSpeaker(idx,'positive'),children:row.positive}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`quality-btn
